snippet.title: War Pinball HD Official Trailer
snippet.description:
War Pinball HD Official Trailer

War Pinball HD is OUT NOW!
http://t.co/v7fuQIB

----

HANDS-ON with War Pinball HD!!! 

From the creators of the legendary Pinball HD... 

The amazing new War Pinball HD, developed in collaboration with MGM Studios. 

Three unique, war-themed pinball tables based on all-time Hollywood hits: 

1. The four-time Oscar winner "Platoon" (directed by Oliver Stone, 
starring Charlie Sheen as Chris) 

2. "Navy SEALs" (directed by Lewis Teague, starring Charlie Sheen as Dale Hawkins, 
Michael Biehn as James Curran) 

3. "Missing in Action" (directed by Joseph Zito, starring Chuck Norris as James Braddock) 

The magic of Hollywood mixed with the magic of the Gameprom 3D Engine 
to provide the best pinball action currently available for the iPhone, 
iPod, and iPad. 

As usual, you get: 

- gameplay with a missions system 
- awesome 3D cinematic graphics 
- a unique soundtrack and voices from the movies 
- camera effects with different types of view 
- local and high scores 
- real-time tweeting of high score results on Twitter 
- hours and hours of pure action in your very own hands 

Take a deep breath... and get it right now!

App Store Link: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/war-pinball-hd/id424232330?mt=8
